Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.Model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents the player of the game

  • Constructor Summary

      public void selectOrder(ArrayList<Integer> at)

      Parameters:
      at - an array of tiles, equals to the tilesArray, but with eventually a different order of the tiles
